Reviews.Title: “Truly a 5star experience”
Reviews.Author: onemoreflight
Reviews.Content: Although the hotel is not quite finished (gym not complete, exterior still being worked on)' this was still a phenomenal experience. The rooms are exquisite and those beds .....well dreamy just doesn't do them justice. The staff are truly attuned to looking after your every need. Rates are reasonable right now because it's new and not fully complete so try it while you can afford it. Soon this will be full rack rate and not negotiable !,

Reviews.Title: “Amazing, Awesome and a wonderful experience!!”
Reviews.Author: SpensMiniCoop
Reviews.Content: My husband and I selected the Urban Romance Pkg and it was more than we expected!! Everything was beautiful, comfortable and the design and decor-awesome. Staff attended to all of your needs and treated us very well. Not like some other hotels who think they are all that!!!!! This is a must stay experience-you won't regret it! From valet to room service, staff are there for your every need. I also went the Quartz Crystal Spa and had an hour massage-wow-awesome. We will definitely be staying here again when visiting the Toronto Area!!

Reviews.Title: “Quality At Its Best!”
Reviews.Author: Albert S
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Trump Toronto for a romantic getaway with my wife. We arrived at the hotel and were greated by a friendly doorman who made us feel very important from the get-go. We entered the hotel to check in, and were very supprised to be greated by our names...(Im still not sure how that happened but was definetly a nice touch). After being escorted to our suite by the bellman, he gave us a tour of the room and showed us how everything worked ( rooms are a little technical- touch panel for the lighting and drapes, tv in the bathroom mirror). Overall we bothed loved the room; they are big,luxurious, and modern! We didnt get a chance to use the spa as we were only there for one night, but we did receive a tour of the facility. It looked really great- I'm sure my wife will spend many hours there on our next visit. The service at this hotel is probably the best I have ever recieved; the staff seem geuinely happy and more than willing to help with anything. I definitely plan on staying here again. From my experience, there is no other hotel in Toronto that tops Trump Tower.

Reviews.Title: “Great New Five Star Experience in Toronto!”
Reviews.Author: SIBSIB
Reviews.Content: Forget the other almost or supposed 5 star hotels, the new Trump hotel is an amazing experience from the moment you arrive till you leave. The location is perfect for business or leisure being right in the heart of Toronto and the staff are extremely helpful to make sure your stay is great in every way. Would definitely stay again and I recommend everyone else to try the Trump experience!

Reviews.Title: “Great resturant and brand new 5 star hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Michaelgoestraveling
Reviews.Content: Met a friend at stock resturant who was staying the weekend at Trump Hotel. He said he liked the great service, nice NEW, Clean rooms and overall was very nice. But we both enjoyed one of the best steaks we have ever had at stock resturant. Amazing good quality steal.

Reviews.Title: “reservation desk”
Reviews.Author: travelfan5203
Reviews.Content: I had reserved a room for a couple of days in March but have fallen ill and therefore, unfortunately, had to cancel the trip and hotel room. Nevertheless, I would like to share my experience I had with my contact person from the reservation department, Mr. Eric Sinclair. Since I am from overseas, at my first contact with him, I had numerous questions which he patiently answered in a very pleasant manner. I once spoke with him over the phone and from then on via e-mail. My e-mails were always answered immediately. He is incredibly competent and once he told me he would have to ask his supervisor and get back to me in about 4 hours - well, sure enough, no minute later, I received his answer. When I get the chance to travel to Toronto in September this year, I will surely book a room at the Trump and hope that everything else in the hotel is just as perfect as Mr. Sinclair. Thanks, Eric!

Reviews.Title: “With time, should improve”
Reviews.Author: Tamara W
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel 3 weeks ago and it was a great experience, with some drawbacks. First of all, staff are clearly there to please, and make every effort to welcome you and provide great service. But when we checked in, our package included a room upgrade and breakfast. The front desk made no mention of these details. So when we got to the room I called to confirm and I was told oh yes - we upgraded your room. This is something you really ought to mention upon check in, otherwise how is the guest supposed to know? The room itself was lovely. We were in a deluxe king suite, and it was beautiful. The fireplace was on when we walked in, and the staff made us feel so welcome and special. Shortly after we settled, there was a knock at the door and we were served with complimentary bottled water and an assortment of cookies and snacks. We asked for an extra robe (there were 3 of us) and some plates, and these were delivered right away. I don't usually pay attention to the bathroom goodies, but it's worth mentioning. From a beautiful sugar scrub to body butter, combined with a deep soaker tub, it's a lovely experience. A note about room service - disappointing. We ordered waffles and felt short changed - seems that we were given two orders of waffles but only one order of fruit and clotted cream. It left us feeling pretty hungry afterwards. The presentation of the waffles was pretty disappointing, let alone the Weight Watchers portion. For the price, we weren't impressed. Also, we ordered 'fresh squeezed orange juice" at a significant cost, and we were served Tropicana. I hate that. All in all, the Trump hotel is a great new hotel and I'm excited to stay there again in the hopes that things improve. It really is a luxe experience, and hopefully management will keep a close eye on Trip Advisor and take this feedback into account.

Reviews.Title: “Excellence Defined an Experience by Pri~ Photography”
Reviews.Author: Priten M
Reviews.Content: Impressive, excellent, amazing, some of few words people may use to describe the hotel itself. However, the true quality of this establishment is the outstanding performance and service of the hotel staff. Never have I experienced this high a level of professionalism and utter most care for a client. Our family had recently stayed in the hotel as a birthday gift to my father for this 50th Birthday. Quality has been met on every level with doorman remembering his name and wishing him a happy birthday to the food that is served with the gorgeous architecture of the Stock Restaurant. An organization is nothing without the people that uphold its reputation, and Trump Tower has mastered the art of service and quality for their clients. Visit again? Absolutely.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service!”
Reviews.Author: domi77c
Reviews.Content: Hotel is amazing and we really loved the food and service at the Stock restaurant. Will be back for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Unparallelled Service, Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Heather S
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked a suite for one night. As we entered the hotel, the doormen were very pleasant and our bags were taken immediately by a courteous employee named Josh. At the check in desk we felt very welcome as if the staff were actually happy to see us. We were literally treated like VIP, as were all of our guests who came to visit that night. The amenities of the room were fantastic. We thoroughly enjoyed the automated system for the lights, blinds, heated floors for the washrooms and a TV in every room. They even thought of the small details, such as providing an ipod/iphone charging dock and a usb charging cable. Breakfast at Stock restaurant, located on the 31st floor, was both healthy and delicious. Flavorful cheeses and freshly squeezed juice accompanied the delicious breakfast options and the home-made yogurt was fantastic. During our checkout we were taken care of by Kervin Van Den Meijdenberg, who was very accommodating and pleasant. We would definitely recommend staying at Trump Hotel, in our opinion it is the best hotel in the GTA and we will be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding! WOW WOW. 100% perfect.”
Reviews.Author: W2012
Reviews.Content: I am currently staying at the hotel and loving every minute. The suites are immaculate, very high standard. The baths are huge and I have taken great pleasure taking a bath and watching a movie on the built in tv in the bathroom mirror! Bed is so so comfortable. The best part of the hotel is the service the staff give you. They call you by name, nothing is too much bother for them, very attentive. They have an attachÃ© service which was second to none and the lady we had took care of everything was 100% perfect in every way, could not fault her. Stock restaurant presented beautiful food, I had the fillet topped with crab, outstanding! I have so much praise for this hotel, from the food at the STOCK restaurant to the maids, concierge, front desk, spa, bar servers, the general manager (who brought ice to our room - so very hands on which I thought was wonderful!), the door men, guys who take your luggage to the room, are amazing! They love to assist you, even if just to chat with you whilst waiting for people, just very caring, honest people who all love their jobs! Great value for money in every way! You must try this hotel. I leave in 2 days and am tempted to extend my stay another few nights! WOW and blown away sums up my feelings. To the staff if they get to read this, keep up the amazing work! You guys are outstanding and you will never fail with the attitude you all have right now. Many congratulations so far and I hope for much success for you all in the future! Many thanks to you all for such a wonderful experience. :) :)

Reviews.Title: “Auto show stopper.”
Reviews.Author: george b
Reviews.Content: Trump hotel is very new on the Toronto hotel scene and it shows. Everything is brand new. In town for one night and the Auto Show we decided to try it out. Rooms are spacious, modern and comfortable with a good working space. The beds are really comfortable and the linens high end, bathrooms are beautiful, with plenty of hot water. Stock restaurant for breakfast included in the room rate was very good with plenty of choices such as croissants, pastries, fresh juices and made to order egg dishes.I prefer this hotel to the Ritz Carlton. Would definitely stay again and it's also less expensive.

Reviews.Title: “it could be a five but with no heat in the room ......”
Reviews.Author: leaffangoleafsgo
Reviews.Content: As a travel agent I don't believe in just being negative - so read on the good after the bad- we had corner rooms arranged for a 60th birthday celebration- with time spent on check in on the importance of having our rooms together- but our room doesnt have its own controls for its head- in fact all the rooms that end in "1" have heating issues- so if they knew why put us there- we literally had cold air and no heat- instead of moving us both (maybe they were sold out I dont know) to a higher end room- as they only offered rooms far away from each other on different floors, they brought up a heater for the room- we said it was fine because we didnt want to be apart - the purpose of the celebration. So in the end they offered to buy us each a drink- one drink for no heat? come on- holiday inn would do better and how they can even have a hotel room with no heat and no heat controls is beyond me. Now the hotel is beautiful- the rooms are very nice - the beds are incredible- the bathrooms are excellent- bath towels are small but high quality- awesome shower, (water was cold but likely just an adjustment required)- views terrific- service and staff extremely attentive- the restaurant bar at the top of the hotel is exceptional- gorgeous, with incredible food - for dinner or breakfast- will be a hot spot in the city for sure.

Reviews.Title: “STOCK Restaurant -”
Reviews.Author: Paul M
Reviews.Content: We had dinner at this new restaurant on Feb 11, 2012 - which was for my birthday. There were definitely some positives and a few opportunities for improvement. The areas of opportunity include: 1. They over cooked my steak I ordered the tenderloin medium rare and it came out medium. When I mentioned it to our server, he agreed that it was in fact over cooked. He of course offered to have a new one cooked for me however I didn't want to wait for a 2nd steak so I ate the one they gave me. In the end, they offered us a complimentary dessert as a result which I thought was nice - having the steak taken off the bill would have been better however... 2. The View This restaurant is on the 31st Floor of the Hotel which should boast nice views of downtown Toronto, however all of the windows had curtains on them blocking the views - not quite sure why. 3. The Hotel Lobby From what we could see, you enter through the revolving door and the lobby consists of a concierge and front desk with a bar in the back.....very small and not that impressive. Maybe there was another entrance? Now, onto the Positives 1. The Service Our server, Darren, was great. Very responsive, knowledgable about the menu and wine list. The manager came around more than once to ask how we were enjoying ourselves. 2. The Size of the Restaurant It is a small restaurant when compared to other hotel restaurants in Toronto - which to us was nice. 3. The Music The DJ and music played was great! I had a chance to speak with the DJ towards the end of the night and it was clear based on our conversation that he is a professional DJ - not some kid who just downloaded a bunch of songs onto a playlist and hit shuffle. His music selections and mixes were perfect for the environment. 4. The Dessert The staff added a candle to my dessert given that it was my birthday which was a nice touch. And the Molten Chocolate Cake was delicious! All in all, I would say that we would give this restaurant another go for sure :)

Reviews.Title: “The Stock Restaurant”
Reviews.Author: jalvara
Reviews.Content: The Food at the Restaurant was AMAZING!!! The Restaurant is beautifully decorated and the staff is very attentive and personable.

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular! Spectacular! Spectacular!”
Reviews.Author: NYCTravelerguy7
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying at the Trump International Hotel & Tower Toronto this February. The entire hotel experience is second to none that I have experienced in my 20 years of travelling worldwide. From making my reservation to arriving to the hotel, I had nothing but attentive and genuine service from all staff! Their attention to detail is beyond belief. This hotel will set the new standard in Toronto! I encourage anyone to stay and experience what the Trump International Hotel & Tower Toronto has to offer!

HotelInfo.Name: Trump International Hotel & Tower Toronto
HotelInfo.Address: 325 Bay St, Toronto, Ontario M5H 4G3, Canada
